user.title: Power Calc Totals
user.description: Power Calc Totals will automatically discover devices with power sensors that need energy sensors and create discovered integrations for each one.

integration_discovery.title: Power Calc Totals: {name}
integration_discovery.description: Do you want to add energy sensors for **{name}**? This will create energy tracking for all power outlets on this device.

confirm.title: Power Calc Totals: {name}
confirm.description: This will create energy sensors for all power outlets on **{name}**.

abort.already_configured: Energy sensor is already configured for this power entity
abort.not_supported: Manual configuration is not supported. Add 'powercalc_totals:' to your configuration.yaml to enable automatic device discovery.
abort.single_instance_allowed: Power Calc Totals is already configured. Discovery runs automatically.
